items.sentence: Tom just told me that he doesn\'t plan to stay in Boston.

I suspected that Tom didn\'t really want to go to Boston.

I could be wrong, but I think it\'ll rain this afternoon.
Why didn\'t you tell me that you were lactose intolerant?
Why do you keep saying things that you know aren\'t true?
You know perfectly well that things don\'t work that way.
I\'m sorry for my terrible French. I\'m still a beginner.
I know a lot of people who don\'t know how to play chess.

Tom was going to lie, but he ended up spilling the beans.

It wasn\'t as hard to do as I thought it was going to be.
It wasn\'t possible for the boy to swim across the river.

I agree with you that we need more women in this company.

Tom has willingly done everything we\'ve asked him to do.
Mary is an intelligent and highly articulate young woman.
Things haven\'t been the same around here since Tom left.
